languages.text: {n}В изумрудном взгляде тлеют искры неподдельного любопытства. Познать душу человека для эльдара — уникальная возможность. И несвойственные эльдарке осторожность и неуверенность намекают, что подобный интерес смущает и саму Ирлиэт.{/n}

{n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В изумрудном взгляде тлеют искры неподдельного любопытства. Познать душу человека для эльдара — уникальная возможность. И несвойственные эльдарке осторожность и неуверенность намекают, что подобный интерес смущает и саму Ирлиэт.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in the emerald gaze. For an Aeldari to get to know a human soul is a unique opportunity. And her uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that such keen interest embarrasses Yrliet as well.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in the emerald gaze. For an Aeldari to get to know a human soul is a unique opportunity. And her uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that such keen interest embarrasses Yrliet as well.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特翠绿色的眼眸中闪烁着真诚的好奇。对艾达灵族而言，这也是个了解人类灵魂好机会。很显然，伊莉耶特不同寻常的谨慎和犹豫态度，表明她也同样对自己莫名的热情感到困扰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特翠绿色的眼眸中闪烁着真诚的好奇。对艾达灵族而言，这也是个了解人类灵魂好机会。很显然，伊莉耶特不同寻常的谨慎和犹豫态度，表明她也同样对自己莫名的热情感到困扰。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Unas brasas de genuina curiosidad refulgen en su mirada esmeralda. Conocer un alma humana es una oportunidad única para una Aeldari. La cautela y la incertidumbre no son propias de Yrliet, lo que significa que ella también se siente desconcertada por su propio interés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas brasas de genuina curiosidad refulgen en su mirada esmeralda. Conocer un alma humana es una oportunidad única para una Aeldari. La cautela y la incertidumbre no son propias de Yrliet, lo que significa que ella también se siente desconcertada por su propio interés.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La curiosité étincelle dans ses yeux émeraude. Explorer une âme humaine est une opportunité unique pour une Aeldari. La prudence et l'incertitude inhabituelles d'Yrliet laissent penser qu'elle est également déconcertée par sa propre curiosité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La curiosité étincelle dans ses yeux émeraude. Explorer une âme humaine est une opportunité unique pour une Aeldari. La prudence et l'incertitude inhabituelles d'Yrliet laissent penser qu'elle est également déconcertée par sa propre curiosité.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Funken echter Neugier blitzen in ihren Smaragdaugen auf. Die Seele eines Menschen zu kennen, ist für Aeldari eine einzigartige Gelegenheit. Und Yrliets unübliche Zurückhaltung und Unsicherheit zeigen, dass sie sich wegen ihres Eigeninteresses unwohl fühlt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Funken echter Neugier blitzen in ihren Smaragdaugen auf. Die Seele eines Menschen zu kennen, ist für Aeldari eine einzigartige Gelegenheit. Und Yrliets unübliche Zurückhaltung und Unsicherheit zeigen, dass sie sich wegen ihres Eigeninteresses unwohl fühlt.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}エメラルド色のまなざしの中に純粋な好奇心の炎がきらめく。人間の魂を知ることは、アエルダリにとってまたとない機会だ。そして、ユリエットのいつもとは異なる警戒心と不安は、強い興味を抱いている自分自身に彼女が当惑していることを暗示している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エメラルド色のまなざしの中に純粋な好奇心の炎がきらめく。人間の魂を知ることは、アエルダリにとってまたとない機会だ。そして、ユリエットのいつもとは異なる警戒心と不安は、強い興味を抱いている自分自身に彼女が当惑していることを暗示している。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yeşim bakışlarında gerçek bir merak filizleniyor. İnsan ruhunu tanımak, Aeldariler için eşsiz bir fırsattır. Yrliet'in alışılmadık dikkati ve kuşkusu, kendisinin de hissettiği ilgiden rahatsız olduğunu gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Embers of genuine curiosity glimmer in her emerald gaze. To know a human soul is a unique opportunity for an Aeldari. And Yrliet's uncharacteristic caution and uncertainty imply that she is also discomfited by her own keen interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeşim bakışlarında gerçek bir merak filizleniyor. Bir insan ruhunu bilmek, Aeldariler için eşsiz bir fırsattır. Yrliet'in alışılmadık dikkati ve kuşkusu, kendisinin de hissettiği ilgiden rahatsız olduğunu gösteriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
